ygData.subject: Anyone near 28 in Kunark?
ygData.msgSnippet: Finally made 28 last night in Cazic. I had never been, having no interest in waiting lists and such. But things are very different now with everyone gone, I
ygData.messageBody:
Finally made 28 last night in Cazic. I had never been, having no interest in
waiting lists and such. But things are very different now with everyone
gone, I was in high demand *grin*. I joined a Throne Room group and quickly
died. Seems the healers didn't really know about Bard hate and the first
multi pull I got smacked. Had a little Come To Jesus Meetin in group say on
my way back, and after some group changes (including the Enchanter leader
who, if she had been doing her job would have been out-taunting me :o)
everything went fine. Got 28th and a bit of safety exp (yay! Staff now procs
Chaotic Feedback!).

I was planning on going after an Obsidian shard next, but with reports of
the stuff being found in Kunark I decided to head there and see if I can do
as well or better. Headed to Kelethin and bought Pixie Strike,
then....boarded the shuttle to Kunark. The boat, oh my goodness, all I could
think of to say in guildsay was "um, wow". And, it seems it is possible to
fall through the boat right at the ramp part, which I did *grin*
(Accelerondo has some culpability in the equasion).

Now, it's 3AM, I don't expect much in the way of official help. So I swim to
the shore and petition for help. I don't at ALL mind exploring but I was
tired and just wanted to log out. However, I got hooked by the swaying of
the trees, the wonderful (empty) ruins and seeing a mountain, I did what I
instinctivly do in real life , I climbed it...to find a HUGE Iskar statue,
arm outstreched with palm up, clearly telling all who would listen to return
home. The sky seemed (er, was) close and I was lost in the beauty when ,
Guide (or GM, I didn't check) Gourmand came to my assistance and summoned me
to FV. *cheers* Nice fellow as well, which was great after my last Guide
experience.
I camped on the docks, Ready to start my exploration. I can't wait.

So! Anyone have suggestions of where to go? I look forward to exploring, but
I have no aversion to level specific spoilers :o)

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 28, Povar
